entry.title: [Global][Domains] - Domains Name incident notification on .IM
entry.content:
Feb 9, 09:49 UTC
Identified - We are currently experiencing an incident affecting our Domains, customers in the impacted zone are unable to perform some tasks.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 09/02/2026 09:40 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Multiple operations (Registration, Renew, Transfer, Restore, Delete) are temporarily unavailable for .IM domains.
Customers Impact : Customers are temporarily unable to perform multiple operations (Registration, Renew, Transfer, Restore, Delete).
Please note that websites are still available.
Unfortunately, customers who want to renew their .IM domain name after the expiration date is already passed will have their websites unavailable.
Ongoing Actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident to fix it.

Our teams are fully engaged and working to resolve the issue as quickly as possible. We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

entry.title: [GRA1][Collaborative solutions] - Cluster128 maintenance notification
entry.content:
Jan 15, 23:19 UTC
Completed - We would like to inform you that the maintenance on our Web Hosting is now completed.
All services are operational.

Thank you for your patience throughout this maintenance.

Jan 15, 21:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Jan 13, 16:22 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Web Hosting offer on Filerz1818 .

This may temporarily affect availability.
Start time: 15/01/2026 21:00 UTC
End time: 15/01/2026 23:00 UTC
Service impact: Filerz1818 will be temporarily unavailable for 30 minutes during the maintenance.
Service improvement: We are going to migrate the Filerz1818 to keep our infrastructure up-to-date and more stable to avoid further downtime. The filerz will have a downtime of 30min during the migration.

Thank you for your understanding.
